alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 1:42AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Franklin Counties through 245 AM EDT/145 AM CDT/... At 142 AM EDT/1242 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mexico Beach, or 11 miles northwest of Port St. Joe, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Tyndall Air Force Base, Nine Mile, Highland View, Eleven Mile, St Joseph State Park, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, Milltown, Davis Beach, Simmons Bayou, Beacon Hill and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf
